request.description: Authenticate user with username and password. Returns access token and sets HTTP-only cookies. The access token is automatically saved to collection variables for use in other requests.
Check if the current access token is valid. Will attempt to refresh if access token is expired but refresh token is valid.
Sign out user and clear authentication cookies.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user login, token validation, and logout.

request.description: Register a new user account. Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol. A default profile is automatically created for the new user.

item.name: User Profile

request.description: View any user's profile information by username. Returns profile data including bio, links, avatar, and cover images. This endpoint is public and does not require authentication.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get your own profile information. Requires authentication. Returns your profile data including bio, links, avatar, and cover images.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Create a new user profile (Note: A default profile is automatically created during user registration). User is identified by the authentication token. Bio is required (10-500 characters). Links are optional (max 10). Avatar and cover images are handled via separate upload endpoints.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Update existing user profile information. User is identified by the authentication token. At least one field (bio or links) must be provided. All fields are optional for updates.

item.description: User profile management endpoints for creating, reading, and updating user profiles. Includes bio, social links, and metadata. Avatar and cover image uploads are handled separately.
